## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Test coverage improvement

## Testing Checklist

- [ ] All existing tests pass (`mix test`)
- [ ] Added tests for new functionality
- [ ] Tested manually (describe below if applicable)
- [ ] Edge cases have been considered and tested

## Quality Checks

- [ ] Code is formatted (`mix format`)
- [ ] No compilation warnings (`mix compile --warnings-as-errors`)
- [ ] Credo checks pass (`mix credo --min-priority high`)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
